items.content_html: Vanilla Calendar is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript framework or library. It is designed to be lightweight, simple to use, and feature-rich without relying on external dependencies.
items.title: ghiscoding/vanilla-calendar-picker: Vanilla Calendar is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript framework or library. It is designed to be lightweight, simple to use, and feature-rich without relying on external dependencies.

items.content_html: Preact Headmaster is a lightweight and efficient head management library for Preact applications, inspired by React Helmet. It allows you to easily manage your document head, including title, meta tags, and other HTML head elements

items.content_html: A full-stack application that not only scrapes data from user-provided URLs but also analyzes and categorizes the data using a lightweight AI model. Add a CI/CD pipeline to automate deployment, with logging and monitoring for real-time performance tracking.

Add a CI/CD pipeline to automate deployment, with logging and monitoring for real-time performance tracking.

items.content_html: Bring your code examples to life with the Magic Motion! This lightweight and customizable library allows you to effortlessly add stunning animations to your code snippets in React applications. Perfect for documentation, tutorials, or any project where you want to showcase code in a visually appealing manner.
